title: What is Semrush .Trends and how does it work?
content:
Semrush .Trends

Semrush .Trends provides an instant market overview and competitive digital insights that help businesses identify new market realities and emerging trends to discover growth opportunities.

What does it include?

As well as your existing access to the Semrush software suite (based on your subscription plan), the Semrush .Trends solution gives you complete access to:

Traffic Analytics gives you a full overview of any company’s online performance. You can explore competitors’ website traffic stats, discover growth points, and amplify your marketing strategy;
Market Explorer gathers insights into any industry to allow you to benchmark yourself against market competitors with Semrush’s all-in-one market research software;
EyeOn automatically tracks your rivals’ moves: from new content to promo shifts;
One2Target offers unique insights into various audience characteristics, such as Demographics, Socioeconomics, Behaviors, and Audience Overlap.
Pricing

You can purchase Semrush .Trends as an add-on for a paid Semrush subscription (or as part of a custom Semrush plan) for $289/month.  

Assuming you have not purchased any other licenses, the price for the .Trends solution on top of your existing subscription would be: 

Pro: $428.95/month 
Guru: $538.95/month
Business: $788.95/month

You can see a full price comparison here.
